column4: im having issues with an nvidia card...instead of images, the monitor flashes like hell. can anyone help me please?
im having issues with an nvidia card...instead of images, the monitor flashes like hell. can anyone help me please?
which graphics drivers are you attempting to use?
nv with an Nvidia GeForce 6200. When booting from liveCD, it did the same thing...should i try another driver? the propietary?
new card, ive installed ubuntu with an ATI card, but now ive switched to nvidia to have dual monitors with beryl....
the nvidia card with the nv driver, even in livecd mode...
im downloading the nvidia-glx driver, lets see if it works. What do you think?
the glx stuff works pretty well with my 6800
what driver are you loading with your xorg.conf, the "nvidia" driver ?
yes, i think the nvidia-glx driver worked.,...
nope, im working on that....maybe 10 or 15 minutes with beryl running on dual screen :)
yes, first the normal setup, then the eye candy :)
forget it, now i have dual monitors with direct rendering...ill go ahead with beryl...
at last i have dual monitors with beryl....ati sucks big time with drivers...though i have to admit, the card is great...
